sections.title: Overview
sections.body: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our application.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.body: We collect account information (name, email), usage data, and device/browser metadata for performance and security.

sections.title: How We Use Information
sections.body: We use information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate updates/support, and ensure compliance.

sections.title: Data Protection
sections.body: We apply reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect your information.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.body: If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact support.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.body: By using this application, you agree to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, discontinue use.

sections.title: Use of Service
sections.body: Use the service lawfully and responsibly. Do not attempt to disrupt or compromise the application. Respect the rights and privacy of other users.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.body: The service is provided 'as is' without warranties. We are not liable for indirect or consequential damages.

sections.title: Changes to Terms
sections.body: We may update these terms. Continued use constitutes acceptance of updated terms.

sections.title: Contact
sections.body: For questions about these terms, please reach out to support.
